title: Test-first policy enforcement (regression tests required per fix)
goal: Enforce a policy that any bugfix requires an accompanying regression test (or explicit waiver) before merge.
steps: Define a convention for linking PRs/WorkOrders to tests added.
Implement an automated check that fails merges if no test evidence is present.
Add a waiver mechanism requiring explicit coordinator approval.

rollback.strategy: Temporarily disable policy enforcement via config; revert check implementation if needed.
